executiveSummary: Entrepreneurs MAF and Coko from Venezuela pitched their Latin American frozen food brand 'Toast-It' on Shark Tank, seeking $100,000 for 5% equity. After negotiations, Daniel Lubetzky invested $150,000 for 20% equity, citing confidence in the founders and their productâ€™s potential despite low margins.
keyDecisions: Daniel Lubetzky agreed to invest $150,000 for 20% equity in Toast-It.

actionItems.task: Optimize production and reduce packaging costs to improve profit margins
Work with Daniel Lubetzky to expand distribution and brand reach

nextSteps: Toast-It will begin collaborating with Daniel Lubetzky to enhance manufacturing efficiency, strengthen market positioning, and scale its retail presence.
